name: Restoration of Time
description:
Alagrazz Montus, an evil sorcerer who seeks to dominate the universe, has infiltrated the mystical Museum of Time and stolen the Sacred Sundial, a device that holds power over and maintains the balance of time. With the power of the Sacred Sundial, Alagrazz has breached the Past, Present, and Future to alter the flow of time and spread his dark magic. Just as Alagrazz is about to claim hold over the timelines, Paros Magnar, a mage of the Shining Kingdom, bursts into the Museum of Time and clashes with the evil sorcerer. In their heated battle, the Sacred Sundial is hit, and shatters into three pieces. Alagrazz, realizing an opportunity, uses his magic to send one of each piece into a timeline, and seals them off with magical locks. To buy himself time, Alagrazz enters the Future to hide, but leaves a trace of magic behind that can manifest doors into each of the timelines.

The fate of this universe is now left to you! Control the brave mage Paros to journey across the Past, Present, and Future timelines to take on Alagrazz's chaotic alterations. Clear a timeline to unlock and recover a piece of the Sacred Sundial and work to fully restore the device and stabilize the flow of time! But be careful, Alagrazz has used his dark magic to create monsters, bend entities to his command, and create an array of obstacles to attempt to bring about your downfall. So brace yourself as you enter each timeline, it will not be an easy journey.

Key Features:

- Forge your own path as you journey to restore the balance of time with free choice of level selection!

- Utilize a magical water blaster to extinguish fires, breach magical doors, and overload robotic foes!

- Search and interact with certain objects across the levels to uncover secrets and easter eggs that update and alter the main hub area!
